casebody.data:
H. L. MEYERS v. Honorable Arthur J. MELLOTT, United States District Judge for the District of Kansas. No. 3388. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Aug. 15, 1946. No appearance for either party.

Before PHILLIPS and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Application for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.
